Articles.Content:
In a freak accident, involving 3 Kerbonauts, a peanut butter sandwich, a small poodle and lots of hairspray, the Jool exploration vessel "Kerbosphere" was lost in Hyperspace. Never to be seen again.

Trough deep space probing and telemetry, Kerbin's most celebrated scientists where able to piece together these last images.

May the Space Kraken have mercy on these 3 brave souls.

[ATTACH=CONFIG]34007[/ATTACH]

etc
Ha ha, looks like the bug where during extreme lag the RCS thrust effects go mad. It does look like hyperspace now that you mention it.

Ha ha, looks like the bug where during extreme lag the RCS thrust effects go mad. It does look like hyperspace now that you mention it.

It probably is, because indeed there was a ton of lag going on. 4 Remotetech capsules was a bit too much for my PC...

May there is one Space Kraken in the Kerbal System. Still!

Who knows? It would be great if they would add the Space Kraken as a Creature visible on the Tracking station. And if you get to close he is going to follow you and shoot Glowing Fireballs at you! And your fuel tank is going to burn! You acn't do anything. THEN KSP would be more difficult.
you left jeb on the control deck unsupervised didnt you...

you left jeb on the control deck unsupervised didnt you...

Bugger.... He's at it again...
